title: Thinking It Through - sequence of paragraphs

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the relationship between the first paragraph and the second and third paragraphs?

choices.label: The first paragraph provides a historical introduction to an intellectual problem; the second and third paragraphs present current ideas about the problem.
The first paragraph approaches an issue from a practical point of view; the second and third paragraphs approach it from a theoretical point of view.
The first paragraph introduces a perspective on an issue; the second and third paragraphs call that perspective into question.
The first paragraph summarizes the point of view that the author is arguing against; the second and third paragraphs offer reasons why the author disagrees with it.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
